title: 04/08/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/08/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP and the boys are joined by a couple hosts and a country music star. Houston area radio host Sean Salisbury joins the show to discuss the newest developments with the Deshaun Watson Case. Darius Rucker calls to join in on our Masters Draft. And the Hosts of the "All the Smoke" podcast, Matt Barnes and Stephen Jackson share some stories from their time in the league.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
